page.title: 20Bryanston Recreation
page.content:
Increased leisure seems a feature of this part of the 20th century. Health & fitness are the current fashions. {The Sports Centre}at Bryanston has a 25m swimming pool,used by pupils,staff & families, Blandford Swimming Club, & local schools. 2 squash courts, also used by a local club, a weight room & gym are in demand & a{new Sports Hall} be added by the autumn. Other activities take people further away: sailing in Poole (boardsailing is fashionable),riding,rifle shooting. Opportunities for "jogging" are more or less unlimited,though its appeal is diminishing.It is infinitely better to walk in the area & enjoy the scenery.
{Text produced by various pupils & {staff at Bryanston School July 1985.
